__e: This was what I was hoping to meet with you about.
No, I've actually gotta meet up with a friend later, so... But thank you.
I know two years is a long time, but I still hoped you would come.
I thought maybe you can meet me on the road and we can continue to spend time together.
All of a sudden, she wants to meet, and I have no idea why.
I know you came a long way to see me, and I'm sorry it took so long.
You're lucky you ran into me when you did.
And it makes sense he wouldn't want to meet in the store.
And then what? Everything else... Meeting me in the park, sleeping with me, that was your job?
And, uh, now here we are. It's been 12 years, and she's agreed to meet me here today.
Any particular reason you wanted to meet here?
You know, I remember when you first called me to come meet you here.
